resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
wgtmac opened a new pull request, #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204

   Use std::make_unique instead.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204#issuecomment-1254762926

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204#issuecomment-1254762953

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

wgtmac commented on PR #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204#issuecomment-1254780179

   > Thanks! Is it also possible to remove occurrences of `using std::make_unique` and instead write `std::make_unique` in full?
   
   Thanks for the review! Please check it again. @pitrou

pitrou commented on PR #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204#issuecomment-1254781619

   I'll just wait for CI now.

pitrou commented on PR #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204#issuecomment-1255013326

   I rebased and fixed conflicts.

wgtmac commented on PR #14204:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14204#issuecomment-1255024899

   > I rebased and fixed conflicts.
   
   I have done the same thing. Sorry for missing your commit. @pitrou

fields.description: The {{make_unique}} reimplementation in {{arrow/util/make_unique.h}} can simply be replace with {{std::make_unique}}.

comments.body: [~wgtmac] Do you want to submit a PR?
[~apitrou] Sure, I will work on it.
